title: Absolved
description: If only Stacey could go back to her childhood, back to her innocence. Back to the happiness she knew before he left, before her pain led to a heartbreaking mistake.She knows she cannot go back, so she moves forward, harboring a secret that haunts her and leaves her with a heavy weight of regret and guilt.Her past threatens to destroy her. Is there a way to truly move on and be a whole person again?
author: Christy Decker
